where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF (QUERY (eca <* QUERY (sar <* USEDIN (SELF, 'BARE_DIE_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATING_SHAPE_ASPECT') | sar\shape_aspect_relationship.name = 'external connection area') | eca.related_shape_aspect\shape_aspect.description = 'connection zone')) = 1

where.label: WR4
where.expression: SIZEOF (QUERY (eca <* QUERY (sar <* USEDIN (SELF, 'BARE_DIE_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATING_SHAPE_ASPECT') | sar\shape_aspect_relationship.name = 'seating plane zone') | 'BARE_DIE_MIM.' + 'CONNECTION_ZONE_INTERFACE_PLANE_RELATIONSHIP' IN TYPEOF (eca.related_shape_aspect))) <= 1

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF (QUERY (eca <* QUERY (sar <* USEDIN (SELF, 'BARE_DIE_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATING_SHAPE_ASPECT') | sar\shape_aspect_relationship.name = 'external connection area') | eca.related_shape_aspect\shape_aspect.description = 'connection zone')) <= 1

where.label: WR4
where.expression: SIZEOF (QUERY (mct <* QUERY (sar <* USEDIN (SELF, 'BARE_DIE_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATED_SHAPE_ASPECT') | sar\shape_aspect_relationship.name = 'member connected terminal') | 'BARE_DIE_MIM.' + 'PART_CONNECTED_TERMINALS_DEFINITION' IN TYPEOF (mct.relating_shape_aspect))) <= 1

rule.name: bare_die_unique_constraint
